Articles.Content:
Hi, in my new science save i have a big problem. I have a massive spawn of asteroids, so many that my fps go down to 1-5 at the map view. I can not proberly navigate with this. In the Spaceship view the fps is.... ok but not good (10-25 FPS @ 90 Parts, fresh save 200+FPS). Can someone help me to delete this asteroids?


Ingame screenshot:

http://abload.de/img/asteroidspfu7k.jpg

Mods folder screenshot:

http://abload.de/img/modsg6ubx.jpg

And sry for the bad english
Its caused by Kopernicus, grab the latest 0.6.3 version which should fix it.

Hi @neocromicon

 

The new version of Kopernicus didn't fix it for me. I tried disabling them in the map view but I still got lag. Eventually, I gave up and went to this file: (KSP, Gamedata, Squad, Parts, Misc, Potatoroid) and I renamed the file in that folder named "part" from a cfg file to a txt. This way I can restore it to a cfg if I want asteroids later. When I opened up the game, I had to click to almost 500 "vessel not loaded" errors for the asteroids, but my game runs better now. PM me if the instructions weren't clear enough, hope this helps!
